snippet: For Masicqua Andrews, talk of family does not conjure warm feelings. She wants to reverse that for her own son.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, one of the seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Masicqua Andrews buy winter clothes for herself and her son.
lead_paragraph: For Masicqua Andrews, talk of family does not conjure warm feelings. She wants to reverse that for her own son.

headline.main: A Young Woman Tries Hard to Be the Kind of Mother That She Never Had
headline.print_headline: A Young Woman Tries Hard to Be the Kind of Mother That She Never Had
